LanguageData.HC_Carbuncle.label: Carbuncle
LanguageData.HC_Carbuncle.description: It is a rare creature the size of a fox or cat, and it is said that it has a beautiful red gem engraved on its forehead.
LanguageData.HC_Carbuncle.tools.0.label: left claw
LanguageData.HC_Carbuncle.tools.1.label: right claw
LanguageData.HC_Carbuncle.tools.3.label: head
